name: Help Me Find My Doll!
description:
Relive your childhood memories in the puzzle/adventure game "Help Me Find My Doll". Similar to any ordinary kid, you must sleep before the clock strikes 12 AM! However, you are unable to calm down and rest if you do not have your most precious doll within your grasp. Find your missing treasure ahead of midnight because if you fail, only the worst awaits you...

(Our first game!) Made for an internal DevelUP Week-long Game Jam (Jan 30, 2022 -> Feb 5, 2022).

Credits:

Maverick de Castro - Puzzle Designer, Writer

Diego Montenejo - Programmer

Zach Romualdez - Programmer

Vince Yalung - Artist, World Designer
